name: Repair Game
description:
Repair Game is a concept for a game made in ~6 hours using Unity.

The original idea was by Foxache and was about repairing broken things, though she couldn't go through with making it as she doesn't know how to program. I added to this idea, it being that unlike other "Build a thing" type games this game works on no grid, you have to precisely place in each component and screw it to the board in order for it to work, instead of the components snapping into place like in other games. 

I created this game because the idea sounded interesting, but I won't continue working on it since I'm busy with aLithuanianSummer, a bigger game I'm working on. If you want to see my coding practices, just want to see how this game works or you want to continue it, download the "RepairGame UNITY PROJECT" file (uses Unity version 2021.3.6f1). If you're going to create a game using this a base, you don't need to credit me... well unless you really really want to.

CONTROLS

  • Mouse to look around
  • F to pick up object
  • Mouse Scroll Wheel to bring object up/down
  • Mouse Button 2 + Mouse to rotate holding object
  • R to put screws in object

If the board lights up you did it!
